note: The Chart tab uses numeric values, ranging from 0 for not free countries to 2 for free countries.
title: Political regime
subtitle: Based on the [classification](#dod:regimes-fh) and estimates by [Freedom House (2024)](#dod:freedom-house). Free countries are understood here as political systems in which citizens have many political rights (free and fair elections, political pluralism and participation, functioning government) and civil liberties (freedoms of expression and association, rule of law, personal autonomy).
